events.message: Received the application from John Doe for the Software Engineer position and reviewed his resume for initial qualifications.
Categorised John Doe's application under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software engineer and development experience.
Assigned recruiter Emily to manage the Software Engineer application process and coordinate next steps.
Conducted initial screening call with John to discuss his software development background and motivation for applying.
John responded promptly to initial screening questions and expressed strong enthusiasm for the engineering role.
Scheduled a technical interview for John with the dev team lead happening on 2024-05-07 to assess coding skills.
